sanskrit_verse:
सुरा वै मलमन्नानां पाप्मा च मलमुच्यते ।
तस्माद्ब्राह्मणराजन्यौ वैश्यश्च न सुरां पिबेत् ॥ ११.९३॥
transliteration:
surā vai malam annānāṁ pāpmā ca malam ucyate |
tasmād brāhmaṇa-rājanyau vaiśyaś ca na surāṁ pibet || 11.93||
sph_interpretive_translation: Surā, being the refuse of foodstuffs and inherently impure, is declared as a defilement; therefore, Brāhmaṇas, Kṣatriyas, and Vaiśyas shall not consume it.
jurisprudential_principles: Causation arises through conscious alignment with inherent dharma
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by varṇic svadharma
Restoration logic requires abstinence from substances that degrade consciousness
Consciousness alignment depends on sensory discipline
executable_legal_axioms: IF actor.varna IN [Brāhmaṇa, Kṣatriya, Vaiśya] AND action.type == 'consumption_of_surā' THEN execute.restraint_protocol.activate()
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this injunction establishes a threshold of responsibility rooted in ontological purity rather than punitive consequence. The court must recognize varṇic svadharma as a determinant of lawful capacity, ensuring alignment with cosmic order over subjective morality.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa reveals surā as causally linked to malam (impurity); thus, its avoidance is not punitive but pramāṇa-based. Responsibility follows sequential manifestation — consumption leads to degradation, which disrupts dharma. Therefore, non-consumption aligns with anupūrvaśaḥ and restores integrity without invoking punishment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate sensory purification process for violator
Assign completion ritual to reaffirm varṇic svadharma
Reintegrate individual into dharmic community through śuddhi ceremony
Restore capacity for conscious discernment via supervised sattvic regimen
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law originates solely from His Avataric Intelligence. Dharma stands restored through adherence to pure conduct. Reality remains non-punitive, governed exclusively by consciousness as the supreme adjudicator.
